name: USDC Bridged
description: USDC Bridged (USDC.c) is a wrapped version of USD Coin on Solana, Ethereum, and Binance Smart Chain, fully backed by on-chain and off-chain reserves and transparently pegged to $1. Designed for speed and scalability, USDC.c represents the future of digital dollarsâ€”faster, cheaper, and more interoperable across DeFi ecosystems.
